post.body: lovely, don't u break down so badly... just stay sweet! <3
WOAH i forgot i was following you!
OH. MY. GOD. love it
I offer my greatest condolences to you and your family; you're in my thoughts and prayers.
there are too many couples in High School, period.
AWESOME!!!!!
That should totally be Twitter's mission statement. "Helping teens procrastinate since 2007"
haha... yes, i know. this is what happens when I'm busy procrastinating.
1707 offenders... now i'm scared...
@rockmaniac i played my trombone and then played guitar hero. So now my mouth and my fingers hurt!!! owwie....
haha no, i play my cousin's. he leaves his PS3 @ our house, so I'm usually playing all of his games!!!
i might just have to play now... dammit rocky!!!
isn't every game of monopoly that way?
that made me laugh so much!!!
That's what she sed.
had some perfect exam prep 2day with a ton of tests- well, time for ICP
two songs i can't help but sing along to: womanizer and hot 'n' cold
holy effing ishmahel... i hate nights like these
top 5 tweeted words: really, love, going, gonna, haha... wow that's soooo typical for me
:( i want to snuggle with my covers and go beddy bye sooo badly... friggin' homework...
um, this girl who's talking to her friends wants her boyfriend to wear cologne. please, stop talking about it...
i am already sick of this day... let it all end!!!
urrgh... it just CAN'T be 6 AM already...
girl, i need a boyfriend
turning into a party planner and avoiding her academic obligations. it's not that i'm a bad student, it's just that i'm lazy... ;)
listening to her friend talk about formal... on and on and on... but it's cool; it sounded awesome
tonight actually wasn;t as depressing as i though it would be... which is good, because I really don't need depression tonight :)
has actually had a fun night being stalkerish on facebook :) LOVES this guy who was in the SC play... looks like chuck bass XD
dear mother, PLEASE do something with me so I won't have to go on doing nothing tonight
my sister has plans for tonight, my mom has plans for tonight, my grandpa has plans for tonight, i have plans to get ice cream for tonight
my life consists of ppl bailing on me, ppl not evn trying, ppl i'm too scared 2 know, & no boys... this high school this isnt working out...
got a totally fab grade on her latest math test when she totally didn't expect it... OH YEAH!!!
so, i think i'll actually try for the youtube symphony orchestra... if i can find the timpani... if so, wish me luck!
You want to feel important? Get important
so, here's how it's gonna be: i won't talk if you won't listen, and if we're not talking then I'm glad it's all over
without the piano, I know not where I'd be.
tomorrow morning, I will be prepared to make history my bitch.
just helped a sista' out. I LOVE opportunities for good karma.
tired as heck... I shouldn't go today... but unfortunately, my room and home are inadequate study zones.
study study study PIZZA i have ADD
yaaaay @errantsock is following me!!! <3
hilighting and pounding this stuff into my mind... also caught up on Gossip Girl... Chuck Bass=BF4L
i MUST study!!!
dear popular youtubers: please refrain from twitter fights, cuz i don't wanna know
UGGH... PLAYED BOARD GAMES 4EVER... and texted... very very sweepy...
hmm friendboy txted me that he was in victoria's secret. i asked him fun or awkward and he sed it got funner the longer he was there...lmfao
hahaha i'm cheeky- found my phone's computer charging cord. ohh yeah
frick. my fone charger totally broke. less time 2 txt :(
my life may suck major balls, but last night I made my own plans and I didn't die... me, myself, and my cell phone had fun
so my friendboy just got his phone yesterday and has already sent over 300 texts. he's textually active...
so, i still really want a relationship, but I have the best guy-friend ever, and no boy is going to come between us :)
watching John Tucker Must Die and texting her faraway lover. i think he's totally running up my texting bill.
i wanna go somewhere/do something... why does everyone always count me out, then let me down? sick sad life...
not going to holiday hop, but kinda relieved. I really won't have any money until after x-mas! then wit gallery hop ima go CRAZY!!!!!
gaaah- i had too much fun baking cookies with so many children. i love my not-blood family!
aaahh fuck. i have a cookie bake in 15 minutes and I've barely even gotten outta bed. shiiiit...
if you meant half the things you've said, you'd make a great friend.
I've met a lot of people in this world, and I've made a lot of friends. Very few of them are friends worth having.
